table

(
  • data
)

Defined in lib/utility.js:161

Draw data in table style

Parameters:

  • data Object

Example:

//console.table console.table([ { .. row .. } ]);

//console.table console.table({ 'head': [ 'I/O ID', 'Endpoint', 'Description' ], 'colWidths': [ 30, 50, 50 ], 'rows': [ [ 'one', 'two', 'three' ], [ 'one', 'two', 'three' ] ] });
